briefdescription.para: Default clock for throttled log messages.
Whether to include global minima in calculations.
Whether to consider minima near the attractive point.
Enable speed adjustment based on distance and steering.
Time delay penalty for the path planner.
Desired field of view of the LiDAR [deg].
Maximum weight for averaging the target steering with attractive index.
Angle in front of the car for speed adjustment.
Gain factor for speed adjustment based on distance.
Topic for subscribing to odometry messages.
Topic for subscribing to pose messages.
Topic for subscribing to laser scan data.
Whether the raceline path has been obtained.
Whether the current speed has been obtained.
Whether the current pose has been obtained.
Whether the pure pursuit algorithm is enabled.
Current odometry pose of the vehicle.
Constructs the PotentialPursuitNode object and initializes parameters, publishers, and subscribers.
Callback for the control status subscriber.

parameterdescription.para: Message indicating whether to enable or disable processing.
Odometry message containing the current speed and pose.
Odometry message containing the current pose of the vehicle.

briefdescription.para: Callback for processing incoming LaserScan messages.
Implements a potential field-based controller for autonomous navigation.

detaileddescription.para: The PotentialPursuitNode class subscribes to sensor data, processes the laser scan input using potential fields, and publishes Ackermann drive commands.
